mapper.select: SELECT vr.resource_code, vr.resource_name, vr.resource_desc, vr.assignable, vr.group_code, vsrg.group_name, vsrg.group_desc FROM ${tablePrefix}space_resource vr JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_resource_group vsrg on vsrg.group_code = vr.group_code

SELECT vr.resource_code, vr.resource_name, vr.resource_desc, vr.assignable, vr.group_code, vsrg.group_name, vsrg.group_desc FROM ${tablePrefix}space_resource vr JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_resource_group vsrg on vsrg.group_code = vr.group_code JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_role_resource_rel vsrrr on vr.resource_code = vsrrr.resource_code JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_role vsr on vsr.role_code = vsrrr.role_code JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_member_role_rel vsmrrr ON vsmrrr.role_code = vsr.role_code and vsmrrr.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT vsrg.group_code, vsrg.group_name, vsrg.group_desc, vr.resource_code FROM ${tablePrefix}space_resource vr JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_resource_group vsrg on vsrg.group_code = vr.group_code WHERE vr.assignable = 1

SELECT vsm.menu_code, vr.resource_code FROM ${tablePrefix}space_resource vr JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_menu_resource_rel vsmrr on vr.resource_code = vsmrr.resource_code JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_menu vsm on vsmrr.menu_code = vsm.menu_code WHERE vr.assignable = 1
SELECT vsrrr.resource_code FROM ${tablePrefix}space_member_role_rel vsmrr JOIN ${tablePrefix}space_role_resource_rel vsrrr on vsmrr.role_code = vsrrr.role_code WHERE vsmrr.member_id = #{memberId}
